entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is the potions master who is evaluating the students' potions. He moves between the tables, peering into cauldrons and occasionally giving them a stir or sniff.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who has made an excellent potion. Slughorn praises Harry's potion, saying it shows he has inherited his mother's talent for Potions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students who has made a tarlike substance in his cauldron. Slughorn smiles ruefully at Ron's potion.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students who has made an excellent potion. Slughorn gives her potion an approving nod.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is one of the students who has made a navy concoction in his cauldron. Slughorn passes over Ernie's potion without comment.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Harry's mother, who was known for her talent in Potions. Slughorn mentions that Harry has inherited his mother's talent.
